description: Main class for the 'ipcGenerator' command-line utility, which processes XML service definition files to generate code. It handles command-line arguments, parses XML documents into ICService objects, sets up processing context, and invokes code generation methods.

classes.name: Main
classes.description: Entry point for the ipcGenerator utility; handles command-line processing, XML parsing, and code generation invocation.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point that processes command-line arguments, parses input XML files, sets up processing context, and triggers code generation.

methods.name: getFiles
methods.description: Recursively or non-recursively retrieves XML files from the specified directory or returns the single file.

methods.name: printUsage
methods.description: Displays usage information and version details.
